definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The molecular sieve pretreated by alkali can improve the stability of catalysts obviously.
sentences.chinese: 分子筛预先经碱处理，能够明显改善催化剂稳定性。

sentences.english: USY zeolite was modified by HF.
sentences.chinese: 对USY分子筛进行HF改性实验。

sentences.english: Studies on nano-zeolite membranes as well as their application are reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 概述了纳米分子筛膜研究及其应用的现状。

sentences.english: The molybdosilicate blue spectrophotometric method for the determination of silicon content in zeolite molecular sieves was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了沸石分子筛中硅含量测定的硅钼蓝光度法。

sentences.english: The preparation of zeolite 4A membrane can be as follows.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究的对象是4A型分子筛膜。

sentences.english: The adsorption mechanism of 13X molecular sieve was preliminary investigated.
sentences.chinese: 初步探讨了13X分子筛对镉的吸附机理。

sentences.english: The application of VPT/DGC in the preparation of shaped zeolite molecular sieves was also introduced.
sentences.chinese: 并且对气相法制备分子筛成型体作了简单介绍。

sentences.english: Absorptivity of A molecular sieve and comparision of their measurement methods.
sentences.chinese: 分子筛吸附性能及其测定方法的比较。

sentences.english: Also described in the article is MWW zeolite′s stability to heat, acid and alkali.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了MWW族分子筛的耐热稳定性和酸碱稳定性。

sentences.english: The invention discloses a coal-based carbon molecular sieve and a preparation method thereof.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种煤基碳分子筛及其制备方法。

sentences.english: The proposal on dealing with the residual LPG in deodorization tower and conservation of molecular sieve is given.
sentences.chinese: 对脱臭塔内残存液的处理和分子筛的储存提出了建议。

sentences.english: The surface of molecular sieves showed an agglomeration of pillar-shaped crystals.
sentences.chinese: 合成出的分子筛为柱状晶片的团状聚集体。

sentences.english: Molecular sieving appears to contribute to the gas permeation.
sentences.chinese: 碳膜分离气体的机理主要为分子筛分。

sentences.english: Presently the condition of most researches about molecular- sieves work at normal temperature and ordinary pressure.
sentences.chinese: 目前对于分子筛吸附特性的研究集中在常压环境。

sentences.english: The molecular sieve bed requires periodic regeneration with hot nitrogen.
sentences.chinese: 分子筛床层需要定期用热氮再生。

sentences.english: The invention silicon phosphoric acid aluminum molecular sieve which has AEL structure and the manufacturing method.
sentences.chinese: 一种具有AEL结构的硅磷酸铝分子筛及其制备方法。

definition: to de-absorb/to get a chemical out of solution
filtrate/solid residue produced by a filter/mud from filtering can sugar
